BTW guyz , also here the Weather Radar is not working (Windows 7)

for me the weather radar is working. its only in a 20-80 nm radius. what isn't working for me is that nice curved route. its all zigzag/connect the dots route for me and yes i have the 1104 AIRAC and was like this on the 1103 one as well. any suggestions?

yeah... the weather thingy is very much simple, and useless, unless flying with the most horrible weather simulated. 
rollkilla is right, read te manual guys, it can't be that hard, only 10 minutes to get the basic how to...

as for the airac, well, i keep flying with the 1010 version, cause the new ones have new frequencies for some ils approaches, but fsx just keep the old ones.

on fsx there is still zig-zag routing, only SID's and STAR's has some improvements

well even in fs9(which I'm using now) the zigzags are there with star and sid's. I don't see any change what so ever from the original panel besides a hud which I don't use nor many airlines use and the WX on the ecam.

yep, and there's another thing i just noticed, i always fly on vc, and with this upgrade, i had a significant frame rate drop, like 5 to 10.

maybe it's just me and my machine...
anyone noticed something similar?
